titles.title: A concurrent resolution providing for a conditional adjournment of the Senate from March 3, or 4, 1988 until March 14, 1988.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 3/3/1988--Introduced. Provides for an adjournment of the Senate from March 3 or 4, 1988, until March 14, 1988.
